LC3 module usage guide

Brief:          This module is the LC3 plus codec implementation for audio. It provides support for LC3 plus encode and decode.

Usage:          For the header files, please refer to the API referenece document in dsp/middleware/airoha/dspalg/lc3plus_codec/inc
                For the libraries, you do not directly call the libraries which are wrapped by dsp/middleware/airoha/dspalg/lc3plus_codec module. 
                For more information, please refer to  dsp/middleware/third_party/dspalg/lc3plus_codec/readme.txt

Dependency:     None

Notice:         None

Relative doc:   None

Example project: None
